verses.verse: And it came<WH1961> to pass in the seventh<WH7637> year,<WH8141> in the fifth<WH2549> month, the tenth<WH6218> day of the month,<WH2320> that certain<WH582> of the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478> came<WH935> to inquire<WH1875> of the LORD,<WH3068> and sat<WH3427> before<WH6440> me.
Then came<WH1961> the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> to me, saying,<WH559>

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> speak<WH1696> to the elders<WH2205> of Israel,<WH3478> and say<WH559> to them, Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Are you come<WH935> to inquire<WH1875> of me? As I live,<WH2416> said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> I will not be inquired<WH1875> of by you.
Will you judge<WH8199> them, son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> will you judge<WH8199> them? cause them to know<WH3045> the abominations<WH8441> of their fathers:<WH1>

And say<WH559> to them, Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> In the day<WH3117> when I chose<WH977> Israel,<WH3478> and lifted<WH5375> up my hand<WH3027> to the seed<WH2233> of the house<WH1004> of Jacob,<WH3290> and made myself known<WH3045> to them in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> when I lifted<WH5375> up my hand<WH3027> to them, saying,<WH559> I am the LORD<WH3068> your God;<WH430>

In the day<WH3117> that I lifted<WH5375> up my hand<WH3027> to them, to bring<WH3318> them forth<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> into<WH413> a land<WH776> that I had espied<WH8446> for them, flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey,<WH1706> which<WH1958> is the glory<WH6643> of all<WH3605> lands:<WH776>

Then said<WH559> I to them, Cast<WH7993> you away every man<WH376> the abominations<WH8251> of his eyes,<WH5869> and defile<WH2930> not yourselves with the idols<WH1544> of Egypt:<WH4714> I am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

But they rebelled<WH4784> against me, and would<WH14> not listen<WH8085> to me: they did not every man<WH376> cast<WH7993> away the abominations<WH8251> of their eyes,<WH5869> neither<WH3808> did they forsake<WH5800> the idols<WH1544> of Egypt:<WH4714> then I said,<WH559> I will pour<WH8210> out my fury<WH2534> on them, to accomplish<WH3615> my anger<WH639> against them in the middle<WH8432> of the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

But I worked<WH6213> for my name's<WH8034> sake,<WH4616> that it should not be polluted<WH2490> before<WH5869> the heathen,<WH1471> among<WH8432> whom<WH834> they were, in whose<WH853> sight<WH5869> I made myself known<WH3045> to them, in bringing<WH3318> them forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>
Why I caused them to go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> and brought<WH935> them into<WH413> the wilderness.<WH4057>
And I gave<WH5414> them my statutes,<WH2708> and showed<WH3045> them my judgments,<WH4941> which<WH834> if a man<WH120> do,<WH6213> he shall even live<WH2425> in them.

Moreover<WH1571> also<WH1571> I gave<WH5414> them my sabbaths,<WH7676> to be a sign<WH226> between<WH996> me and them, that they might know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068> that sanctify<WH6942> them.

But the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> rebelled<WH4784> against me in the wilderness:<WH4057> they walked<WH1980> not in my statutes,<WH2708> and they despised<WH3988> my judgments,<WH4941> which<WH834> if a man<WH120> do,<WH6213> he shall even live<WH2425> in them; and my sabbaths<WH7676> they greatly<WH3966> polluted:<WH2490> then I said,<WH559> I would pour<WH8210> out my fury<WH2534> on them in the wilderness,<WH4057> to consume<WH3615> them.
But I worked<WH6213> for my name's<WH8034> sake,<WH4616> that it should not be polluted<WH2490> before<WH5869> the heathen,<WH1471> in whose<WH834> sight<WH5869> I brought<WH3318> them out.

Yet also<WH1571> I lifted<WH5375> up my hand<WH3027> to them in the wilderness,<WH4057> that I would not bring<WH935> them into<WH413> the land<WH776> which<WH834> I had given<WH5414> them, flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey,<WH1706> which<WH1958> is the glory of all<WH3605> lands;<WH776>

Because<WH3282> they despised<WH3988> my judgments,<WH4941> and walked<WH1980> not in my statutes,<WH2708> but polluted<WH2490> my sabbaths:<WH7676> for their heart<WH3820> went<WH1980> after<WH310> their idols.<WH1544>
Nevertheless my eye<WH5869> spared<WH2347> them from destroying<WH7843> them, neither<WH3808> did I make<WH6213> an end<WH3615> of them in the wilderness.<WH4057>

But I said<WH559> to their children<WH1121> in the wilderness,<WH4057> Walk<WH3212> you not in the statutes<WH2706> of your fathers,<WH1> neither<WH408> observe<WH8104> their judgments,<WH4941> nor<WH408> defile<WH2930> yourselves with their idols:<WH1544>
I am the LORD<WH3068> your God;<WH430> walk<WH3212> in my statutes,<WH2708> and keep<WH8104> my judgments,<WH4941> and do<WH6213> them;
And hallow<WH6942> my sabbaths;<WH7676> and they shall be a sign<WH226> between<WH996> me and you, that you may know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

Notwithstanding the children<WH1121> rebelled<WH4784> against me: they walked<WH1980> not in my statutes,<WH2708> neither<WH3808> kept<WH8104> my judgments<WH4941> to do<WH6213> them, which<WH834> if a man<WH120> do,<WH6213> he shall even live<WH2425> in them; they polluted<WH2490> my sabbaths:<WH7676> then I said,<WH559> I would pour<WH8210> out my fury<WH2534> on them, to accomplish<WH3615> my anger<WH639> against them in the wilderness.<WH4057>

Nevertheless I withdrew<WH7725> my hand,<WH3027> and worked<WH6213> for my name's<WH8034> sake,<WH4616> that it should not be polluted<WH2490> in the sight<WH5869> of the heathen,<WH1471> in whose<WH834> sight<WH5869> I brought<WH3318> them forth.<WH3318>

I lifted<WH5375> up my hand<WH3027> to them also<WH1571> in the wilderness,<WH4057> that I would scatter<WH6327> them among the heathen,<WH1471> and disperse<WH2219> them through the countries;<WH776>

Because<WH3282> they had not executed<WH6213> my judgments,<WH4941> but had despised<WH3988> my statutes,<WH2708> and had polluted<WH2490> my sabbaths,<WH7676> and their eyes<WH5869> were after<WH310> their fathers'<WH1> idols.<WH1544>
Why I gave<WH5414> them also<WH1571> statutes<WH2706> that were not good,<WH2896> and judgments<WH4941> whereby they should not live;<WH2421>

And I polluted<WH2930> them in their own gifts,<WH4979> in that they caused to pass<WH5674> through the fire all<WH3605> that opens<WH6363> the womb,<WH7356> that I might make them desolate,<WH8074> to the end<WH4616> that they might know<WH3045> that I am the LORD.<WH3068>

Therefore,<WH3651> son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> speak<WH1696> to the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> and say<WH559> to them, Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Yet<WH5750> in this<WH2063> your fathers<WH1> have blasphemed<WH1442> me, in that they have committed<WH4603> a trespass<WH4604> against me.

For when I had brought<WH935> them into<WH413> the land,<WH776> for the which<WH834> I lifted<WH5375> up my hand<WH3027> to give<WH5414> it to them, then they saw<WH7200> every<WH3605> high<WH7311> hill,<WH1389> and all<WH3605> the thick<WH5687> trees,<WH6086> and they offered<WH2076> there<WH8033> their sacrifices,<WH2077> and there<WH8033> they presented<WH5414> the provocation<WH3708> of their offering:<WH7133> there<WH8033> also they made<WH7760> their sweet<WH5207> smell,<WH7381> and poured<WH5258> out there<WH8033> their drink<WH5262> offerings.
Then I said<WH559> to them, What<WH4100> is the high<WH1116> place whereunto<WH834> <WH8033> you go?<WH935> And the name<WH8034> whereof is called<WH7121> Bamah<WH1117> to this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>

Why<WH3651> say<WH559> to the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Are you polluted<WH2930> after the manner<WH1870> of your fathers?<WH1> and commit<WH2181> you prostitution<WH2181> after<WH310> their abominations?<WH8251>

For when you offer<WH5375> your gifts,<WH4979> when you make your sons<WH1121> to pass<WH5674> through the fire,<WH784> you pollute<WH2930> yourselves with all<WH3605> your idols,<WH1544> even to this day:<WH3117> and shall I be inquired<WH1875> of by you, O house<WH1004> of Israel?<WH3478> As I live,<WH2416> said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> I will not be inquired of by you.

And that which comes<WH5927> into<WH5921> your mind<WH7307> shall not be at all, that you say,<WH559> We will be as the heathen,<WH1471> as the families<WH4940> of the countries,<WH776> to serve<WH8334> wood<WH6086> and stone.<WH68>

As I live, said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> surely<WH518> <WH3808> with a mighty<WH2389> hand,<WH3027> and with a stretched<WH5186> out arm,<WH2220> and with fury<WH2534> poured<WH8210> out, will I rule<WH4427> over you:

And I will bring<WH3318> you out from the people,<WH5971> and will gather<WH6908> you out of the countries<WH776> wherein<WH834> you are scattered,<WH6327> with a mighty<WH2389> hand,<WH3027> and with a stretched<WH5186> out arm,<WH2220> and with fury<WH2534> poured<WH8210> out.
And I will bring<WH935> you into<WH413> the wilderness<WH4057> of the people,<WH5971> and there<WH8033> will I plead<WH8199> with you face<WH6440> to face.<WH6440>
Like as I pleaded<WH8199> with your fathers<WH1> in the wilderness<WH4057> of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> so<WH3651> will I plead<WH8199> with you, said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
And I will cause you to pass<WH5674> under<WH8478> the rod,<WH7626> and I will bring<WH935> you into the bond<WH4562> of the covenant:<WH1285>

And I will purge<WH1305> out from among you the rebels,<WH4775> and them that transgress<WH6586> against me: I will bring<WH3318> them forth<WH3318> out of the country<WH776> where they sojourn,<WH4033> and they shall not enter<WH935> into<WH413> the land<WH127> of Israel:<WH3478> and you shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD.<WH3068>

As for you, O house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Go<WH3212> you, serve<WH5647> you every<WH376> one<WH376> his idols,<WH1544> and hereafter<WH310> also, if<WH518> you will not listen<WH8085> to me: but pollute<WH2490> you my holy<WH6944> name<WH8034> no<WH3808> more<WH5750> with your gifts,<WH4979> and with your idols.<WH1544>

For in my holy<WH6944> mountain,<WH2022> in the mountain<WH2022> of the height<WH4791> of Israel,<WH3478> said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> there<WH8033> shall all<WH3605> the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> all<WH3605> of them in the land,<WH776> serve<WH5647> me: there<WH8033> will I accept<WH7521> them, and there<WH8033> will I require<WH1875> your offerings,<WH8641> and the first fruits<WH7225> of your oblations,<WH4864> with all<WH3605> your holy things.

I will accept<WH7521> you with your sweet<WH5207> smell,<WH7381> when I bring<WH3318> you out from the people,<WH5971> and gather<WH6908> you out of the countries<WH776> wherein you have been scattered;<WH6327> and I will be sanctified<WH6942> in you before<WH5869> the heathen.<WH1471>

And you shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD,<WH3068> when I shall bring<WH935> you into<WH413> the land<WH127> of Israel,<WH3478> into<WH413> the country<WH776> for the which<WH834> I lifted<WH5375> up my hand<WH3027> to give<WH5414> it to your fathers.<WH1>

And there<WH8033> shall you remember<WH2142> your ways,<WH1870> and all<WH3605> your doings,<WH5949> wherein<WH834> you have been defiled;<WH2930> and you shall loathe<WH6962> yourselves in your own sight<WH6440> for all<WH3605> your evils<WH7451> that you have committed.<WH6213>

And you shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD <WH3068>when I have worked<WH6213> with you for my name's<WH8034> sake,<WH4616> not according to your wicked<WH7451> ways,<WH1870> nor according to your corrupt<WH7843> doings,<WH5949> O you house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
Moreover the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> set<WH7760> your face<WH6440> toward<WH1870> the south,<WH8486> and drop<WH5197> your word toward<WH413> the south,<WH1864> and prophesy<WH5012> against<WH413> the forest<WH3293> of the south<WH5045> field;<WH7704>

And say<WH559> to the forest<WH3293> of the south,<WH5045> Hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of the LORD;<WH3068> Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Behold,<WH2005> I will kindle<WH3341> a fire<WH784> in you, and it shall devour<WH398> every<WH3605> green<WH3892> tree<WH6086> in you, and every<WH3605> dry<WH3002> tree:<WH6086> the flaming<WH3852> flame<WH7957> shall not be quenched,<WH3518> and all<WH3605> faces<WH6440> from the south<WH5045> to the north<WH6828> shall be burned<WH6866> therein.
And all<WH3605> flesh<WH1320> shall see<WH7200> that I the LORD<WH3068> have kindled<WH1197> it: it shall not be quenched.<WH3518>
Then said<WH559> I, Ah<WH162> Lord<WH136> GOD!<WH3069> they say<WH559> of me, Does he not speak<WH4911> parables?<WH4912>
